arm_group.description:
group- 25 patients will take sitagliptin 50 mg  and metformin 1000 mg twice in a day
group- 25 patients will take placebo 50 mg and metformin 1000 mg twice in a day

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients with Type 2 Diabetes, age 35-75y., will be included in this double blind randomized
      placebo controlled study.

      The sample size of 50  patients completing the 30 day study period is based on statistical
      input from Merck Research Laboratories, Rahway NJ.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Type 2 diabetes

          -  receiving a stable dose of metformin  ≥ 1500 mg

          -  HbA1c 7,5% -10/0 %

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Type 1 diabetes

          -  HbA1c < 7,5% and > 10,0%

intervention.description: sitagliptin 50 / metformin 1000 twice in a day and placebo 50 mg /metformin 1000 twice in a day

overall_official.affiliation: Scientific Clinical Center of OJSC Russian Railways

oversight_info.authority: Russia: Ministry of Health of the Russian Federation
